TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResourceExpressionEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor

summary.span: 提供用于在设计时计算和编辑资源表达式的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides properties and methods for evaluating and editing a resource expression at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类，并提供了评估和在设计时与控件属性关联的资源引用实现。The class derives from the class and provides an implementation for evaluating and associating a resource reference with a control property at design time. 例如，可以将控件属性的值绑定到的资源表达式`Resources:submitText`，该值指示控件属性值已设置使用命名的资源`submitText`。For example, you can bind the value of a control property to the resource expression `Resources:submitText`, which indicates that the control property value is set using the resource named `submitText`. 可视化设计器宿主，如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，使用类来指定资源类、 密钥和资源表达式，设计器的默认值，然后评估设计时呈现的所选的资源表达式。A visual designer host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the class to specify a resource class, key, and designer default value for a resource expression, and then evaluate the selected resource expression for design-time rendering. 当您浏览设计时属性网格中的控件的属性，可视化设计器显示一个对话框来设置控件属性提供的运行时间值的表达式。When you browse the property for a control in the design-time properties grid, the visual designer displays a dialog box to set expressions that provide the run-time value for a control property. 可以选择基于的表达式前缀列表的表达式类型。You can select the expression type based on a list of expression prefixes. 当选择**资源**在列表中，可视化设计器使用的表达式前缀方法，以便设置，评估，并转换基于资源表达式语法的表达式。When you select the **Resources** expression prefix in the list, the visual designer uses the methods to set, evaluate, and convert the expression based on the resource expression syntax. 可视化设计器使用计算的表达式结果来指定控件在设计图面呈现的属性值。The visual designer uses the evaluated expression result to assign control property values that are rendered on the design surface. 基属性返回的字符串`Resources`。The base property for a returns the string `Resources`. 类是与表达式前缀相关联`Resources`和实现。The class is associated with the expression prefix `Resources` and the implementation. 方法计算输入的资源表达式。The method evaluates an input resource expression. 方法将返回用于选择资源名称、 类和设计器的默认值，并从所选的资源值为资源表达式的实现。The method returns the implementation that is used to select the resource name, class, and designer default value, and to form a resource expression from the selected resource values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将绑定的属性资源表达式使用的控件类。The following code example demonstrates how to bind the property of a control to a resource expression using the class. 1. 在 Web 窗体项目中，添加新的 App_LocalResources 目录到名为 Strings.resx 的资源文件。In a Web Forms project, add a new resource file named Strings.resx to the App_LocalResources directory. 2. 添加一个名为 Strings.resx 的资源文件，myLinkText 字符串，然后将值设置为文本控件。Add a string named myLinkText to the Strings.resx resource file, and then set the value to the text for a control. 例如，设置`myLinkText`字符串到值`This is a good link`。For example, set the `myLinkText` string value to `This is a good link`. 3. 在 Web 窗体页中，添加控件。In a Web Forms page, add a control. 4. 有关`Hyperlink`控件，在属性中，单击**表达式**，然后单击省略号按钮 (**...**).For the `Hyperlink` control, in Properties, click **Expressions**, and then click the ellipsis button (**...**). ``**表达式**对话框随即出现。The ``**Expressions** dialog box appears. 5. 下**可绑定属性**，单击**文本**，然后在**表达式类型**列表中，输入**资源**。Under **Bindable properties**, click **Text**, and then in the **Expression type** list, enter **Resources**. 由定义的资源表达式属性类显示。The resource expression properties that are defined by the class appear. 6. 下**表达式的属性**设置**ClassName**到**字符串**，这是编译 Strings.resx 的资源文件并将设置的类名**ResourceKey**到**myLinkText**，这是在 Strings.resx 的字符串名称。Under **Expression Properties** set **ClassName** to **Strings**, which is the class name for the compiled Strings.resx resource file and set **ResourceKey** to **myLinkText**, which is the string name in Strings.resx. 可视化设计器使用要分配的资源表达式`Text`属性。The visual designer uses the to assign the resource expression for the `Text` property. 以下的.aspx 源将显示使用的资源表达式设置属性值的一个示例。The following .aspx source shows an example of a property value that is set by using a resource expression. [!code-aspx-csharp[ControlsUsingExpressions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/CS/controlsusingexpressionscs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[ControlsUsingExpressions#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/VB/controlsusingexpressionsvb.aspx#3)] [!code-xml[ControlsUsingExpressions#3](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/Common/controlsusingexpressions.xml#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象配置一起使用的基类属性设置为`Resources`。A object is configured by the base class together with an property set to `Resources`.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EvaluateExpression (string expression, object parseTimeData, Type propertyType, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EvaluateExpression(string expression, object parseTimeData, class System.Type propertyType, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function EvaluateExpression (expression As String, parseTimeData As Object, propertyType As Type, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ EvaluateExpression(System::String ^ expression, System::Object ^ parseTimeData, Type ^ propertyType, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);
override this.EvaluateExpression : string * obj * Type * IServiceProvider -> obj

param.name: expression
param.span: 不包含 表达式前缀。

span.span: does not include the expression prefix.

param.name: parseTimeData
param.span: 一个对象，它以 值的形式提供附加分析数据。

span.span: An object supplying additional parse data, in the form of a value.
The type of the control property.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 一个由设计器宿主提供的服务提供程序实现，用于获取其他设计时服务。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.

summary.span: 计算资源表达式并提供控件属性的设计时值。

span.span: Evaluates a resource expression and provides the design-time value for a control property.

returns.span: 如果表达式计算成功，则为由计算的表达式字符串引用的对象；否则为 。

span.span: The object referenced by the evaluated expression string, if the expression evaluation succeeded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法查找由指定的资源`expression`，然后返回该资源。The method looks up the resource that is specified by `expression`, and then returns the resource. 可视化设计器使用方法计算资源表达式的值并为关联的控件属性提供设计时值。The visual designer uses the method to evaluate a resource expression and provide the design-time value for an associated control property. 在运行时，页面分析程序使用并方法的相应实现来计算表达式，并为关联的控件属性提供的运行时间值。At run time, the page parser uses the and methods of the corresponding implementation to evaluate an expression and provide the run-time value for an associated control property. 可视化设计器使用方法，以便在设计时，然后调用分析的表达式字符串分析得出的表达式数据的方法。The visual designer uses the method to parse the expression string at design time, and then calls the method with the parsed expression data.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet (string expression, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet(string expression, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetExpressionEditorSheet (expression As String, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As ExpressionEditorSheet
public: override System::Web::UI::Design::ExpressionEditorSheet ^ GetExpressionEditorSheet(System::String ^ expression, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);

param.name: expression
param.span: 一个资源表达式，用于初始化表达式编辑器表。

span.span: A resource expression, used to initialize the expression editor sheet.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 设计器宿主提供的服务提供程序实现，用于初始化表达式编辑器表。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to initialize the expression editor sheet.

summary.span: 返回使用输入表达式字符串和服务提供程序实现初始化的资源表达式编辑器表。

span.span: Returns a resource expression editor sheet that is initialized with the input expression string and service provider implementation.

returns.span: 一个 ，定义资源表达式属性。

span.span: A that defines the resource expression properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个表达式编辑器资源表达式的表实现。The method returns an expression editor sheet implementation for resource expressions. 可视化设计器宿主在其表达式对话框中使用表达式编辑器表。The visual designer host uses the expression editor sheet in its expressions dialog box.
